Proposed Groupchat process

Legend(key):
UUID - unique id that uniquely identifies the chat group 
UserA - group starter's torchat address
UserB - group participant's torchat address
UserC - group participant's torchat address (leaves later)
UserD - group participant's torchat address (joins later)

UserA wants to start a group, so creates a new string with starting information about the group. Lets call it "GroupInfo"

initial structure of groupInfo:
groupInfo = UUID UserA [UserB] [UserC]
